node.text: Rain batters the window of your office. A dame in a red dress walks in. She looks like trouble. "My husband is missing," she says.
She leaves a stack of cash on the desk and walks out. You stare at the money, then the bottle of whiskey. It's going to be a long night.
You head to the husband's last known location: The Blue Note Jazz Club.
The bartender wipes a glass. "Johnny? Yeah, he was here. left with some tough guys in suits."
You pick the lock. Inside, you find a poker game run by the mob. They don't look happy to see you.
You throw a punch, but there are too many of them. Everything goes black.
"I'm just looking for Johnny," you say smoothly. The boss laughs. "Johnny's sleeping with the fishes. You wanna join him?"
You find Johnny tied up in a warehouse. You cut him loose just as the cops arrive. Case closed.
You crash through the window and land in the alley. You lost the lead, but you kept your life.
